questions.question: In digital logic, a counter is a device which ____________

answers.b: Stores the number of times a particular event or process has occurred
answers.c: Stores the number of times a clock pulse rises and falls

questions.question: A counter circuit is usually constructed of ____________

answers.a: A number of latches connected in cascade form
answers.b: A number of NAND gates connected in cascade form
answers.c: A number of flip-flops connected in cascade
answers.d: A number of NOR gates connected in cascade form
